summary: We've issued many reports in recent years about diversity and inclusion efforts in the financial services industry. One common theme is the importance of using data to assess those efforts. We testified about how the financial services industry uses data to identify and address problems, such as workforce retention issues. We also discussed diversity-related data collected by government-sponsored banks and federally-chartered enterprises. The banks and...
title: Financial Services Industry: Using Data to Promote Greater Diversity and Inclusion
